knimeNode.name: The Looper's Head
knimeNode.shortDescription: Node at the head of a loop

fullDescription.intro: The Looper's Head is the node that starts a loop that is executed a predefined number of times. At the end of the loop you need The Looper's Tail, which collects the results from all loop iterations. All nodes in between are executed as many times as you specify in the dialog of The Looper's head.
fullDescription.option: The number of times the inner workflow should be executed.
